name: Only Ban!
description:
You will go on an exciting journey, where you will be waiting for various Easter eggs, references, as well as difficult obstacles, platforms, mazes that require reaction and the ability to control your character. Strive to get to the very top the fastest to prove your superiority!

In the game you will find:
Trampolines
Possibility of getting stuck in textures
Excellent optimization
Much more

Your goal is to overcome a series of difficult obstacles using parkour skills and reach the top. You have to make jumps, pave paths on narrow railings, do tricks and avoid dangers to climb higher and higher.

You will have to use your reaction, flexibility and precision to overcome obstacles and move forward. Thanks to precise controls and excellent motion physics, you will be able to experience the authentic freedom of parkour.

Only ban! It offers exciting visuals and unforgettable adventures. Climb to the top and show the world that you are a real master of parkour!

* Parody game

ONLY BAN!
